title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1635/1999 of 26 July 1999 fixing the exchange rate applicable to certain direct aids
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1635/1999
of 26 July 1999
fixing the exchange rate applicable to certain direct aids
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The exchange rate to be applied to:
- the aids referred to in Article 4(1) of Regulation (EC) No 2808/98 having an operative event on 1 July 1999, and
- the aid for hops provided for in Article 12 of Regulation (EEC) No 1696/71,
shall be that indicated in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
